Articles.Content:
The KDF (Kerbal Defence Force) is requiring new equipment for military use, however they have some pretty strict requirements: 

Aircraft

Heavy Bomber: Must be capable of flying over 10,000 feet, contains a decent amount of defensive armament, and can support a minimum of 20 General Purpose Bombs 

Medium Bomber: Must be capable of flying over 7,000 feet, contains defensive armament, and can support minimum of 15 general purpose bombs

Light Bomber: Must be capable of flying over 5,000 feet, contains minimum one defensive armament,  and can support minimum 2 bombs

Naval Bomber: Capable of Carrier operations, optional defensive armament, and can support minimum 1 bomb

Fighter: Capable of high speeds, high manoeuvrability, contains minimum 1 offensive armament, and can support 1 kerbal

Attack:  Average speeds, decent manoeuvrability, contains minimum 2 offensive armament, and can support 2 kerbals 

Interceptor: Extreme speeds, high manoeuvrability, contains minimum 4 offensive armament, and can support 1 kerbal 

Transport:  decent speeds, low manoeuvrability, can support minimum 5 kerbals (excluding pilot) and capable of Skydive. 

Attack Helicopter: decent speeds, high manoeuvrability, minimum 3 offensive armament, and can support 1 kerbal

Transport Helicopter: same as Transport, though can support minimum 4 kerbals (excluding pilot) and capable of hover. 

 

Ground 
Main Battle Tank: capable of decent speeds, high defence and offence and can support 2 kerbals 

Medium Tank: capable of decent speeds, moderate defence and offence and can support 2 kerbals

Light Tank: capable of decent speeds, low defence and offence and can support 1 kerbal 

Transport: capable of decent speeds, low defence and can support 3 kerbals (excluding driver) 

 

Naval 

Destroyer: capable of decent speeds, high defence and offence

Cruiser: capable of decent speeds, moderate defence and offence 

Transport (Lander): Capable of Landing, moderate defence and low offence

Aircraft Carrier: Capable of Supporting Aircraft, High defence and low offence 

 

Bonus

Drones: no kerbals, low defence and high offence 

TBA

 

Awarding Gold, Silver and Bronze for all categories. may the best applier win!

 

stock + DLC is allowed, however part mods are prohibited. (weapon mods are exempt)

 

 

 

Edited April 27, 2022 by MegaPlayer1121
Missed a bit in Description
What is the deadline? I might consider finishing an old project for this challenge
